Class Game

java.lang.Object
  


All Implemented Interfaces: 
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible








public class Game
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The class that holds both the frame and the canvas This class is responsible for maintaining and painting the window and implements the keyListener that forwards the events to an instance of the ActionManager class

Version:
(11/11/14)
Author:
(John Remmes)
